Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: The student can accurately draw two students using a string telephone to communicate over a distance, showing a clear connection between them.
The student can effectively depict how the string telephone uses sound to send or receive information between students by possibly illustrating sound waves or vibrations traveling along the string.
The student can properly label the string, cups, or tin cans used in the string telephone device with appropriate terminology.
The student can represent the path through which sound travels along the string, possibly using arrows to indicate direction.
The student can creatively demonstrate how this device helps in communication over distances, potentially by showing a conversation or message being transmitted.
CANNOT: The student may have minor inaccuracies or incomplete labeling, such as forgetting to label one component, but this does not significantly detract from their overall understanding.
The student might show a small inconsistency, such as not drawing arrows consistently in both directions to represent sound travel, but the main concept is still effectively communicated.
